content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 7 main components
- It consists of 4 layers:
  1. Bottom: Yellow horizontal bar
  2. Middle-bottom: Red block with circular hole
  3. Middle-top: Two green vertical pillars with yellow horizontal bar
  4. Top: Orange triangular roof piece with yellow horizontal bar

Required blocks from dictionary (bottom to top assembly):
- Base: Horizontal yellow bar (Block 9)
- Middle: Red arch piece (combination of Blocks 2 and 3)
- Support pillars: Two green vertical blocks (Blocks 6 and 7)
- Middle bar: Horizontal yellow bar (Block 10)
- Top bar: Horizontal yellow bar (Block 9)
- Roof: Orange triangular piece (Block 14)

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 9
    Step2: Move block with index 2
    Step3: Move block with index 3
    Step4: Move block with index 6
    Step5: Move block with index 7
    Step6: Move block with index 10
    Step7: Move block with index 9
    Step8: Move block with index 14
}

This will create the complete structure as shown in the target image, with proper placement and orientation of all blocks.
